SELECT a.*, m.id AS machine_id, m.machine_code AS machine_code, ap.id AS state FROM inno72_admin_area a LEFT JOIN inno72_locale locale ON LEFT ( locale.area_code, #{num}) = LEFT ( a.CODE, #{num}) LEFT JOIN inno72_machine m ON locale.id = m.locale_id LEFT JOIN inno72_activity_plan_machine apm ON m.id = apm.machine_id LEFT JOIN inno72_activity_plan ap ON apm.activity_plan_id = ap.id WHERE a.parent_code = #{code} a.LEVEL = #{level}
and ( #{startTime} BETWEEN ap.start_time AND ap.end_time or #{endTime} BETWEEN ap.start_time AND ap.end_time OR ap.id IS NULL )

SELECT machine_id FROM inno72_activity_plan ap LEFT JOIN inno72_activity_plan_machine apm ON apm.activity_plan_id = ap.id where is_delete =0 and ( #{startTime} BETWEEN ap.start_time AND ap.end_time or #{endTime} BETWEEN ap.start_time AND ap.end_time
)

SELECT m.id, machine_code as machineCode, CONCAT( aa.province, aa.city, aa.district, aa.circle ) as area FROM inno72_machine m LEFT JOIN inno72_activity_plan_machine apm ON m.id = apm.machine_id LEFT JOIN inno72_activity_plan ap ON apm.activity_plan_id = ap.id LEFT JOIN inno72_locale l ON l.id = m.locale_id LEFT JOIN inno72_admin_area aa ON aa.CODE = l.area_code WHERE apm.machine_id IS NULL and ( #{taskTime} > ap.end_time or #{taskTime} < ap.start_time
)
SELECT count(1) FROM inno72_activity_plan ap where is_delete =0 and ap.id =#{id} and (NOW() BETWEEN ap.start_time AND ap.end_time)

SELECT ap.*, rg.prize_id AS goods_id, rg.result_code AS goods_result_code, rg.result_remark AS goods_result_remark, rg.prize_type AS goods_prize_type, rc.result_code AS coupons_result_code, rc.result_remark AS coupons_result_remark, rc.prize_type AS coupons_prize_type, co.code AS coupons_code, co.name AS coupons_name, a.name AS activityName FROM inno72_activity_plan ap LEFT JOIN inno72_activity_plan_game_result rg ON rg.activity_plan_id = ap.id and rg.prize_type=1 LEFT JOIN inno72_activity_plan_game_result rc ON rc.activity_plan_id = ap.id and rc.prize_type=2 LEFT JOIN inno72_coupon co ON co.id = rc.prize_id LEFT JOIN inno72_activity a ON a.id = ap.activity_id WHERE ap.is_delete =0 and ap.id=#{id}
